<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Enables/disables mimics on a given unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''enableMimics''' enabled

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enabled: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[cursorTarget]] [[enableMimics]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMimic]]
